titleStmt.title: SII 4.290: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 290. [A.R. 61.]

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . nāyaṉār viranāraciṅkatevayātavarāyaṟku yāṇṭu nāṟpatāvatu Aippacimātam Irupatāntiyati koyilāḻvārkku koyilukku koyil ceyya tecāntarikaḷil tiruppullāṇidāsar Ārampikkaiyil muṉpu taṉta koyil Āḻvāril kalveṭṭuppaṭi Eṭuttu mutal prākārattile vaṭakku vīcaiyil puṟavāyile kalveṭṭuvippateṉṟu tāṉattārkku nāyaṉār tirumukam varukaiyil tirumukappaṭi kalveṭṭuvateṉṟu tāṉamāka niyamikka Ivvāṇṭai cittirai mātam 2 10 2 ntiyati veḷḷikkiḻamai Uttirāṭattu nāḷ kallu veṭṭiṉapaṭi svasti
śrī . tirumakaḷ polap perunilaccelviyum taṉakoṉurimai pūṇṭa maṉattoḷ kāntaḷurccakala kalaiyaṟuttaruḷi veṅkai nācamum tuḷappāṭiyum kaṅkapāṭiyum kaṭikaivaḻiyum kuṭamalaināṭum kollāpuramuṅ kaliṅkamum tiṇṭiṟal veṉṟi taṇṭālvaḷaikoṇṭa taṉṉeḻil varai vāḻiyuḷ ḷellām Āṇṭu toḻutaka pivaikum Āṇṭe ceḻiyaṉ tecukoḷ ko vīrarājarājentra paṉmaṟku yāṇṭu 16 vatu ceramāṉār makaḷār poṉmāḷikaittuñcināṉ teviyār tevi Ammaṉār tiruveṅkaṭatevaṟku Iṭṭa paṭṭa
m kuṭiṉaikkallāl poṉ 5 10 kaḻañcu Itilaḻuttiṉa māṇikkam Āṟum vayiram nālum muttu Irupatteṭṭum Ippaṭṭam Iṭṭār parāntakatevi AmmaṉIt may be noted that many misreadings have been committed by the copyist who was perhaps not able to read the old inscriptions correctly.
Digital edition of SII 4.290 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
